summary: This document is a forwarded email chain containing internal jail records regarding Jeffrey Epstein's detention at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It details specific dates and times when Epstein was placed on and removed from psychology observation and inmate companion watch status in July 2019, shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who is the subject of the jail watch and psychology observation records detailed in the forwarded email.

persons.name: LCDR United States Public Health Service
persons.context: A forensic psychologist affiliated with the U.S. Public Health Service, mentioned in the context of the psychology observation records at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

connections.description: The forensic psychologist was involved in the psychological observation of inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on staff watch and an inmate companion took over monitoring duties at 7:00 am.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was under specific monitoring protocols, including 'staff watch' and 'inmate companion', at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in July 2019.
Epstein was placed on 'Psychology Observation' status on July 24, 2019, and this observation ended on July 30, 2019.
A prior 'Psychology Observation' period for Epstein occurred from July 8 to July 10, 2019.
A forensic psychologist with the rank of LCDR in the U.S. Public Health Service was involved in these observations.
The document is a forwarded email dated August 15, 2019, containing these internal jail records, circulated shortly after Epstein's death.
